hanzi-su-wiki:
衝

Значения

Ударяться, сталкиваться, нападать; главное, суть

Мнемоника

Тяжёлая 重 боевая колесница для атак, перемещаемая 行 с трудом.

Варианты

冲

heisig_chinese_memo: Two heavy trucks in a game of chicken collide while racing toward each other on the boulevard.
heisig_constituent: collide, boulevard, going, heavy, thousand, ri, computer
Keyword_KANJIDIC: collide, brunt, highway, opposition (astronomy), thrust, pierce, stab, prick
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Collide, тяжесть, шоссе, оппозиция (астрономия), тяга, прокалывать, удар, укол
koohiiStory1: Two heavy trucks in a game of chicken collide while racing toward each other on the boulevard.
koohiiStory2: 衝 【しょう】 (n) (1) important point (e.g. on a route); (2) important role (responsibility, etc.); (3) (astronomical) opposition. STORY:Two HEAVY trucks are playing a game of chicken on the BOULEVARD. However, they both missed the IMPORTANT POINT: that they have to turn in different directions. Naturally, they COLLIDE when they both turn in the same direction. (ty dingomick).
jp_example_words:
衝撃(しょうげき): shock, crash, impact, ballistic
衝突(しょうとつ): collision, conflict
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you try to go somewhere but you're too heavy you'll collide with everything. Cars, people, houses. You're too heavy to dodge them, so you collide with it all.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imaging being too heavy to go anywhere without colliding with things.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're going around the town, you collide with a bunch of things, when all of a sudden you collide with the Shougun (しょう)! Oh no! The shogun looks really mad.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The Shougun is glaring at you from the ground. "You've been colliding with my entire city and now you collide into ME?!" Smoke blows out his nostrils.
Ru_Meaning: collide, brunt, highway, opposition (astronomy), thrust, pierce, stab, prick
Ru_Radicals: ｜, 彳 (шаг), 日 (день), 行 (идти), 里 (родная деревня)

chòng: (глаг/прил/предлог) стоять лицом к; резкий, сильный, энергичный; на основании, из-за
Kanshudo_mnemonic: as you go (行) something heavy (重) collides with you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Two heavy trucks in a game of chicken collide while racing toward each other on the boulevard.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Xing " to " Heavy " sound, the original meaning is channel. " Chong " is the same as " 𧘂 ", "Shuowen": "Passage also. Congxing, children's voice. "Chunqiu Zhuan" says: and 𧘂, hit it with a war." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhao AD": "﹝子Xi ﹞ marry his wife if he wants to kill. Zinan knows it and fights against it. When he rushes, he strikes it to fight.” Du's note: “Chong, deal.”

" Crush " can mean impact. "Six Secret Teachings-Enemy Martial Arts": "The enemy is chasing me, sending me a ride to the left and right."

" Chong " also means thorn. "Han Shu·Jia Yi Biography": "Bai Gong is in chaos, and he does not want to be the master of the country. He is angry and quick to fight. He is smashing the enemy's breasts. ."

" Chong " also means to destroy or destroy. Song Yeshi's "New Book": "This dynasty takes the law as the sutra, and the format of the imperial decree is revised at any time...then rush forward and change the old with the new."

" Chong " also means risking, and usually refers to moving forward regardless of danger or harsh environment. Tang Hanyu "Master Guangxuan has seen it frequently": "Three hundred and sixty-year-old disturbances will cause dust if it is not stormy."

" Crushing " also means facing, facing, and right. "Shan Hai Jing‧ Overseas North Jing": "Taiwan is all around, and there is a snake in the corner, the color of a tiger, and it first rushes south."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " line " to " heavy " sound, the original meaning is channel.
humanum_full_description:
從「行」，「重」聲，本義為通道。「衝」同於「𧘂」，《說文》：「通道也。从行，童聲。《春秋傳》曰：及𧘂，以戈擊之。」《左傳‧昭公元年》：「﹝子晰﹞欲殺之而娶其妻。子南知之，執戈逐之。及衝，擊之以戈。」杜預注：「衝，交道。」

　　「衝」可表示沖擊。《六韜‧敵武》：「敵人逐我，發我車騎衝其左右。」

　　「衝」也表示刺。《漢書‧賈誼傳》：「白公為亂，非欲取國代主也，發憤快志，剡手以衝仇人之胸，固為俱靡而已。」顏師古注：「衝，刺也。」

　　「衝」還表示破除、毀壞。宋葉適《新書》：「本朝以律為經，而敕令格式隨時脩立……以後衝前，以新改舊。」

　　「衝」還表示冒著，多指不顧危險或惡劣環境而向前行進。唐韓愈〈廣宣上人頻見過〉：「三百六旬長擾擾，不衝風雨即塵埃。」

　　「衝」亦表示向着、對着、當着。《山海經‧海外北經》：「臺四方，隅有一蛇，虎色，首衝南方。」

衝衝RS rush against, charge ahead, collide
  • going 行 with a heavy load 重 rushing to be on time but colliding allong the way
(Simplified: 冲)
Pictophonetic: 重 indicates the sound; 行 (go) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿴ Full surround
    • 行 [ xíng ] to go, to walk, to move; professional
    • 重 [ zhòng ] heavy, weighty; to double, to repeat
①用水或酒澆注，水撞擊：沖茶。沖劑。沖洗。衝蕩。
②向上鑽，直上：衝騰。衝入雲霄。
③破解不祥：沖喜。
④空虛，謙虛：“大盈若衝，其用不窮”。衝挹。謙沖。
⑤幼小：沖昧。沖弱。沖齡。
⑥方言，山區的平地：韶山沖。
⑦通行的大路，重要的地方：要衝。首當其衝。
⑧不顧一切，一直向前：衝鋒。橫衝直撞。
⑨猛烈地撞擊：衝力。衝突。
⑩收支賬目互相抵銷：衝賬。
⑾情感強烈：衝動。興(xìng)沖沖。
⑿太陽系中，除水星和金星外，其餘的某一個行星進行到與地球、太陽成一條直線而地球正處在這個行星與太陽之間的位置時稱“衝”。
衝突 [ chōng tū ]: conflict; to conflict; clash of opposing forces; collision (of interests); contention
衝擊 [ chōng jī ]: to attack; to batter; (of waves) to pound against; shock; impact
衝動 [ chōng dòng ]: to have an urge; to be impetuous; impulse; urge
衝鋒 [ chōng fēng ]: to charge; to assault; assault
沖天 [ chōng tiān ]: to soar; to rocket
①對着，向着：衝着太陽。
②憑，根據：衝你這麼好學，一定能有成就。
③猛烈；強烈：衝勁。這酒真衝。
④一種使金屬板成形或在金屬板上打孔的專用設備稱“衝牀”。
⑤在衝牀上加工金屬工件：衝壓。
沖壓 [ chòng yā ]: to stamp; to press (sheet metal); Taiwan pr. [chong1 ya1]
衝勁 [ chòng jìn ]: dynamism; drive

衝撃(しょうげき): shock, crash, impact, ballistic
衝突(しょうとつ): collision, conflict

從「 行 」，「 重 」聲，本義為通道。「 衝 」同於「 𧘂 」，《說文》：「通道也。从行，童聲。《春秋傳》曰：及𧘂，以戈擊之。」《左傳‧昭公元年》：「﹝子晰﹞欲殺之而娶其妻。子南知之，執戈逐之。及衝，擊之以戈。」杜預注：「衝，交道。」 「 衝 」可表示沖擊。《六韜‧敵武》：「敵人逐我，發我車騎衝其左右。」 「 衝 」也表示刺。《漢書‧賈誼傳》：「白公為亂，非欲取國代主也，發憤快志，剡手以衝仇人之胸，固為俱靡而已。」顏師古注：「衝，刺也。」 「 衝 」還表示破除、毀壞。宋葉適《新書》：「本朝以律為經，而敕令格式隨時脩立……以後衝前，以新改舊。」 「 衝 」還表示冒著，多指不顧危險或惡劣環境而向前行進。唐韓愈〈廣宣上人頻見過〉：「三百六旬長擾擾，不衝風雨即塵埃。」 「 衝 」亦表示向着、對着、當着。《山海經‧海外北經》：「臺四方，隅有一蛇，虎色，首衝南方。」
From " Xing" to " Heavy" sound, the original meaning is channel. " Chong" is the same as " 𧘂", "Shuowen": "Passage also. Congxing, children's voice. "Chunqiu Zhuan" says: and 𧘂, hit it with a war." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhao AD": "﹝子Xi ﹞ marry his wife if he wants to kill. Zinan knows it and fights against it. When he rushes, he strikes it to fight.” Du's note: “Chong, deal.” " Crush" can mean impact. "Six Secret Teachings-Enemy Martial Arts": "The enemy is chasing me, sending me a ride to the left and right." " Chong" also means thorn. "Han Shu·Jia Yi Biography": "Bai Gong is in chaos, and he does not want to be the master of the country. He is angry and quick to fight. He is smashing the enemy's breasts. ." " Chong" also means to destroy or destroy. Song Yeshi's "New Book": "This dynasty takes the law as the sutra, and the format of the imperial decree is revised at any time...then rush forward and change the old with the new." " Chong" also means risking, and usually refers to moving forward regardless of danger or harsh environment. Tang Hanyu "Master Guangxuan has seen it frequently": "Three hundred and sixty-year-old disturbances will cause dust if it is not stormy." " Crushing" also means facing, facing, and right. "Shan Hai Jing‧ Overseas North Jing": "Taiwan is all around, and there is a snake in the corner, the color of a tiger, and it first rushes south."

Liushutong characters (3)

衝字的基本解释

衝
chōng
见“冲1”⑦⑧⑨。
同“艟”。

衝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōng］
［《廣韻》尺容切，平鍾，昌。］
“1”的今字。“冲2”的繁体字。
(1)交通要道。
(2)突袭；冲击。
(3)谓直朝某一方向而去。
(4)穿；刺。
(5)冲撞；碰撞。
(6)指撞见，碰见。
(7)破除；毁坏。
(8)冒。多指不顾危险或恶劣环境而向前行进。
(9)动。
(10)见“衝衝”。
(11)星相术士谓相克相忌为“衝”。俗亦作“沖”。
(12)冲刷；灌注。后多作“沖”。
(13)古战车名。用以攻城。
(14)人体经脉名。参见“衝脈”。
(15)天文学名词。太阳系中，除内行星（水星、金星）外，其余的某一行星，运行到跟地球、太阳成一直线，而地球正处在直线的中间位置时，叫做冲。参见“衝日”。
[②]［chòng］
［《廣韻》尺容切，平鍾，昌。］
“冲3”的繁体字。
(1)向着；对着；当着。
(2)向前突出。
(3)劲头足，勇气大。
(4)猛烈。
(5)谓气味浓烈刺鼻。
(6)介词。凭；根据。

衝字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【行字部】　衝； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1110第03
【唐韻】尺容切【集韻】【韻會】昌容切，?音?。【說文】通道也。【前漢·酈食其傳】夫陳留，天下之衝，四通五達之郊也。　又【博雅】動也。　又【廣韻】當也，向也，突也。　又車也。【詩·大雅】以爾鉤援，與爾臨衝，以伐崇墉。【疏】兵書有作臨車、衝車之法。　又蒙衝，船名。【吳志·賀齊傳】齊性奢綺，蒙衝鬭艦之屬，望之若山。　又折衝。【淮南子·說山訓】國有賢君，折衝萬里。　又官名。【綱目】唐更號統軍別將爲折衝都尉。【集覽】折衝者，所以折兵衝也。　又天衝，星名。【晉書·天文志】歲星之精，流爲天衝。　又中衝，脈也。【素問】心出于中衝。中衝，手中指之端也。　又【博雅】衝衝，行也。　又【集韻】蠢勇切，音喠。【類篇】衝蓯，相入貌。【司馬相如·大人賦】騷擾衝蓯。又昌用切，讀去聲。要也。　又【韻補】叶陽韻。【道藏歌】引領囂庭內，開心機穢衝。一靜安居若，試去視滄浪。【說文】本作?。徐曰：南北東西各有道相?也。【前漢·律歷志】林鍾未之?丑爲地正。【司馬相如·上林賦】披巖?擁。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chōng］
["Guangyun" Ruler Rongqie, Pingzhong, Chang. ]
The present character of "1". Traditional characters for "冲2".
(1) Traffic arteries.
(2) Raid; shock.
(3) It means going straight in a certain direction.
(4) Piercing; puncture.
(5) Collision; collision.
(6) Refer to see, meet.
(7) Destroy; destroy.
(8) Take off. Refers to moving forward regardless of danger or harsh environment.
(9) Move.
(10) See "Chong Chong".
(11) The astrology warlock called the "Chong" as the "Chong". Vulgar is also called "chong".
(12) Scour; perfusion. Later, more "rush".
(13) The name of the ancient chariot. Used to siege the city.
(14) The name of the meridian of the human body. See "Chongmai".
(15) Astronomical terms. In the solar system, with the exception of the inner planets (Mercury and Venus), the other planets move in a straight line with the earth and the sun, and the earth is in the middle of the straight line, it is called an opposition. See "Reaching the Sun".

Name meaning
Nothing.
chōng, chòng
вм. 冲
Radicals: 行, 重  (go, heavy)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you try to go somewhere but you're too heavy you'll collide with everything. Cars, people, houses. You're too heavy to dodge them, so you collide with it all.
Imaging being too heavy to go anywhere without colliding with things.
Reading Mnemonic
You're going around the town, you collide with a bunch of things, when all of a sudden you collide with the Shougun (しょう)! Oh no! The shogun looks really mad.
The Shougun is glaring at you from the ground. "You've been colliding with my entire city and now you collide into ME?!" Smoke blows out his nostrils.
